I  learned from that to keep the limbs sticks to ease the work and allow more time, for other parts,


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555f39ce63687266f0782700#post_555f39ce63687266f0782700
I know that, hence calling myself a jackass i was taking my share of the blame,


Also i have done better
!http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/235/b/3/croven_pony_by_thanotosomega-d6jfquh.jpg!

and i would like to point out in my defense, that all my art work is almost all that i made, so i was sharing my early scraps because i know they aren't great but they are mine and i'm proud of what i achieved,
